meta.review_content: Your Automated support desk is utter useless. I upgraded my vodacom contract in February and the new simcard is still offline. Your automated chatbot keeps going into a look asking if I want my latest account statement, or activate CLIP. I want neither. I need the new SIM card to be activated.
